statements: SELECT * FROM personal_information;
SELECT name, email FROM personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM personal_information ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM personal_information WHERE id > 10;
SELECT id, password FROM personal_information WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, name, email FROM personal_information ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM personal_information WHERE name = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_victims;
SELECT full_name, social_security_number FROM identity_theft_victims ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT victim_id, date_of_birth FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stolen_credit_cards;
SELECT card_number, cvv_code FROM stolen_credit_cards WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_victims;
SELECT victim_id, full_name FROM identity_theft_victims WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM stolen_credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, social_security_number, date_of_birth FROM identity_theft_victims ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(card_id) AS total_cards, victim_id FROM stolen_credit_cards GROUP BY victim_id HAVING total_cards > 1;
